Class CannonBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • CannonBall

  • public class CannonBall
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this CannonBall class is to simulate the motion of a CannonBall when fired from a cannon at a particular angle and initial velocity, assuming a constant velocity.
    Since:
    November 30, 2014

    • Constructor Detail

      • CannonBall

        public CannonBall()
        Construct a cannonball at the default x position of zero.

      • CannonBall

        public CannonBall(double xPos)
        Construct a cannonball at the given x position.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The x position where the cannonball is fired.

    • Method Detail

      • displayGraphic

        private static void displayGraphic(double yPos)
        Displays a graphic of the cannon ball and the ground at a given y postion. Only prints text to the console.
        Parameters:
        yPos - The position of the cannonball above the ground.

      • displayLocation

        private static void displayLocation(double elapsed,
                   double xPos,
                   double yPos)
        Display the current elapsed time and x+y coordinates. Only prints text to the console.
        Parameters:
        elapsed - The current elapsed time.
        xPos - The current x position.
        yPos - The current y position.

      • getX

        Get the current x position.
        Returns:

      • getElapsed

        public double getElapsed()
        Get the current elapsed time.
        Returns:
        The current elapsed time.

      • moveBall

        public void moveBall(double timeChange)
        Moves the cannonball for the given time unit based on its x and y velocities, and also updates y velocity with respect to gravity.
        Parameters:
        timeChange - The change in time, in seconds.

      • repeat

        private static java.lang.String repeat(java.lang.String str,
                      int times)
        Produces a string composed the given string repeated a given number of times.
        Parameters:
        str - The string to be repeated.
        times - The number of times the string is repeated.
        Returns:
        The given string repeated the given number of times.

      • shoot

        public void shoot(double launchAngle,
         double initialVelocity)
        Simulates a cannonball being fired given the launch angle and initial velocity. Displays a full simulation until cannonball hits ground or the simulation runs out of time.
        Parameters:
        launchAngle - The launch angle of the cannonball, in degrees.
        initialVelocity - The velocity of the cannonball, in meters per second.

      • getComponentX

        private static double getComponentX(double angle,
                   double magnitude)
        Calculates the x component of a vector.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle of the vector.
        magnitude - The magnitude of the vector.
        Returns:
        The magnitude of the x component of the vector.

        private static double getComponentY(double angle,

        Calculates the y component of a vector.
        Parameters:

        magnitude - The magnitude of the vector.
        Returns:
        The magnitude of the y component of the vector.
